soc.robot

Class DiscardStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • soc.robot.DiscardStrategy
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SampleDiscardStrategy

    public class DiscardStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
    Discard strategy for a SOCRobotBrain in a game. For details see discard(int, SOCBuildPlanStack).

    Before version 2.2.00 that method was static and could not easily be extended.

    • Method Detail

      • discard

        public SOCResourceSet discard(int numDiscards,
                              SOCBuildPlanStack buildingPlan)
        When we have to discard, try to keep the resources needed for our building plan. If we don't have a plan, make one by calling SOCRobotDM.planStuff(int). Otherwise, discard at random. Calls SOCRobotNegotiator.setTargetPiece(int, SOCPossiblePiece) to remember the piece we want to build, in case we'll need to trade for its lost resources.
        Parameters:
        numDiscards - Required number of discards
        buildingPlan - Brain's current building plan; may be empty
        Returns:
        Resources to discard, which should be a subset of ourPlayerData.getResources()
